Champion Bumper Race Card

The Champion Bumper is always a tough race to have a bet on as more often than not plenty of the runners have only been on the track once or twice before. With that in mind the full race card should be checked out before having a bet as it will have form lines and connection details for each of the runners in the field. The bumper is always a popular race as we look for some big stars of the future as recent winners Dunguib and Cue Card have proved.
